<core:FragmentDefinition
   xmlns="sap.m"
   xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
      xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
   xmlns:core="sap.ui.core">
   <Popover
      class="myCustomPopover"
      id="npmPopover"
      placement="Bottom"
      title="Eye Able Assistent"
      contentWidth="300px">
      <content>
         <List
            id="modulesList"
            items="{modules>/items}"
            showSeparators="None"
            backgroundDesign="Transparent">
            <items>
               <CustomListItem>
                  <content>
                     <Panel
                        expandable="{modules>expandable}"
                        backgroundDesign="Transparent"
                        expanded="false"
                        width="auto">
                        <headerToolbar>
                           <OverflowToolbar press=".onPanelHeaderPress">
                              <core:Icon src="{modules>icon}" />
                              <Title text="{modules>name}" />
                           </OverflowToolbar>
                        </headerToolbar>
                        <content>

                             <f:SimpleForm layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" visible="{= ${modules>name} === 'Schriftgröße' }">
                              <!-- HBox ile yatay ve ortalanmış bir düzen oluşturuyoruz -->
                              <HBox justifyContent="Center" alignItems="Center" width="100%" class="sapUiSmallMarginTopBottom">
                                 
                                 <!-- Azaltma Butonu -->
                                 <Button 
                                    id="decreaseFontButton" 
                                    icon="sap-icon://sys-minus" 
                                    class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd" />
                                 
                                 <!-- Ortadaki grup: Sayaç ve Sıfırlama Butonu -->
                                 <VBox alignItems="Center">
                                    <Input
                                       id="fontStepInput"
                                       value="{settings>/fontStep}"
                                       editable="false"
                                       width="4rem"
                                       textAlign="Center" />
                                    <Button
                                       id="resetFontButton"
                                       icon="sap-icon://refresh"
                                       type="Transparent" />
                                 </VBox>

                                 <!-- Artırma Butonu -->
                                 <Button 
                                    id="increaseFontButton" 
                                    icon="sap-icon://add" 
                                    class="sapUiTinyMarginBegin" />

                              </HBox>
                           </f:SimpleForm>
                        </content>
                     </Panel>
                  </content>
               </CustomListItem>
            </items>
         </List>
      </content>
      <footer>
         <Toolbar>
            <ToolbarSpacer />
            <Button
               id="closePopoverButton"
               text="Schließen" />
         </Toolbar>
      </footer>
   </Popover>
</core:FragmentDefinition>
